name: Nemo is going to School
description:
Our main character, Nemo, goes to school again today.
I go up and up to go to school 351m above the sky.
You can't help it if you fall. You have to go up without a break to not be late!
There are bad weather and dangerous stairs above. You have to hold back even if you're angry.
Now, head to school!


Basically, this game is a speed-run game that passes through a difficult map in the shortest time.
The game also has several Easter eggs hidden in it, and you can enjoy your content without getting tired of it through your achievements.
The title screen also allows you to move the player to perform several activities.


How to move players:
The square can be moved from side to side through the A/D key or rudder on the keyboard.
By clicking the mouse, you can jump up to 2 times with the force of the jump.
Typically, contact with an object gives you a jump force.


Special Block:
A red block cannot gain jumping force even if it touches it.
Orange blocks have the property of turning.
The mint block only moves up and down, and disappears after 3 seconds of contact.
Blue blocks have various properties.
